post.description: Create a user on your account

action.description: Specify how to create the new user
x-enum-descriptions:
User will get an email sent from Zoom. There is a confirmation link in this email. User will then need to click this link to activate their account to the Zoom service. The user can set or change their password in Zoom.
.

This action is provided for enterprise customer who has a managed domain. This feature is disabled by default because of the security risk involved in creating a user who does not belong to your domain without notifying the user.
This action is provided for API partner only. User created in this way has no password and is not able to log into the Zoom web site or client.

This action is provided for enabled "Pre-provisioning SSO User" option. User created in this way has no password. If it is not a basic user, will generate a Personal Vanity URL using user name (no domain) of the provisioning email. If user name or pmi is invalid or occupied, will use random number/random personal vanity URL.

first_name.description: User's first name. Cannot contain more than 5 Chinese words.

last_name.description: User's last name. Cannot contain more than 5 Chinese words.

User will get an email sent from Zoom. There is a confirmation link in this email. User will then need to click this link to activate their account to the Zoom service. The user can set or change their password in Zoom.
.

This action is provided for enterprise customer who has a managed domain. This feature is disabled by default because of the security risk involved in creating a user who does not belong to your domain without notifying the user.
This action is provided for API partner only. User created in this way has no password and is not able to log into the Zoom web site or client.

This action is provided for enabled "Pre-provisioning SSO User" option. User created in this way has no password. If it is not a basic user, will generate a Personal Vanity URL using user name (no domain) of the provisioning email. If user name or pmi is invalid or occupied, will use random number/random personal vanity URL.

Account.description: The account object represents an account on zoom. The person who created the account, or who the account was created for, is referred to as the account owner. You can read more about the Zoom account structure here.

room_connectors.description: Virtual Room Connector, multiple value separated by comma

meeting_connectors.description: Meeting Connector, multiple values separated by comma

hosts.description: Account base plan number of hosts. For a Pro Plan, please select a value between 1 and 9. For a Business Plan, please select a value between 10 and 49. For a Education Plan, please select a value between 20 and 149. For a Free Trial Plan, please select a value between 1 and 9999.

tollfree_countries.description: Toll-free countries, multiple value separated by comma

premium_countries.description: Premium countries, multiple value separated by comma

callout_countries.description: Call-out countries, multiple value separated by comma

host_video.description: Start meetings with host video on

participant_video.description: Start meetings with participant video on. Participants can change this during the meeting.

audio_type.description: Determine how participants can join the audio portion of the meeting

join_before_host.description: Allow participants to join the meeting before the host arrives

enforce_login.description: Only signed-in (Zoom users) users can join meetings

enforce_login_with_domains.description: Only signed-in users with a specific domain can join meetings

enforce_login_domains.description: Only signed-in users with a specified domains

not_store_meeting_topic.description: Always display "Zoom Meeting" as the meeting topic

force_pmi_jbh_password.description: Require a password for Personal Meetings if attendees can join before host

e2e_encryption.description: Require that all meetings are encrypted using AES

chat.description: Allow meeting participants to send a message visible to all participants

private_chat.description: Allow meeting participants to send a private 1:1 message to another participants

auto_saving_chat.description: Automatically save all in-meeting chats so that hosts do not need to manually save the text of the chat after the meeting starts

file_transfer.description: Hosts and participants can send files through the in-meeting chat

feedback.description: Add a Feedback tab to the Windows Settings or Mac Preferences dialog, and also enable users to provide feedback to Zoom at the end of the meeting

post_meeting_feedback.description: Display a thumbs up/down survey at the end of each meeting

co_host.description: Allow the host to add co-hosts

attendee_on_hold.description: Allow hosts to temporarily remove an attendee from the meeting

allow_show_zoom_windows.description: Show Zoom Desktop application when sharing screen

annotation.description: Allow participants to use annotation tools to add information to shared screens

whiteboard.description: Allow participants to share a whiteboard that includes annotation tools

breakout_room.description: Allow host to split meeting participants into separate, smaller rooms

closed_caption.description: Allow host to type closed captions or assign a participant/third party device to add closed captions

far_end_camera_control.description: Allow another user to take control of your camera during a meeting

group_hd.description: Activate higher quality video for host and participants. (This will use more bandwidth.)

virtual_background.description: Allow users to replace their background with any selected image. Choose or upload an image in the Zoom Desktop application settings.

watermark.description: Add watermark when viewing shared screen

alert_guest_join.description: Identify guest participants in the meeting/webinar

auto_answer.description: Enable users to see and add contacts to 'auto-answer group' in the contact list on chat. Any call from members of this group will be automatically answered.

p2p_connetion.description: Peer to Peer connection while only 2 people are in a meeting

ports_range.description: Listening ports range, separated by comma (ex 55,56). The ports range must be between 1 to 65535.

sending_default_email_invites.description: Only show default email when sending email invites

use_html_format_email.description: Use HTML format email for Outlook plugin

stereo_audio.description: Allow users to select stereo audio in their client settings

original_audio.description: Allow users to select original sound in their client settings

remote_control.description: Allow users to request remote control

attention_tracking.description: Lets the host see an indicator in the participant panel if a meeting/webinar attendee does not have Zoom in focus during screen sharing

cloud_recording_avaliable_reminder.description: Notify host when cloud recording is available

jbh_reminder.description: Notify host when participants join the meeting before them

cancel_meeting_reminder.description: Notify host and participants when the meeting is cancelled

low_host_count_reminder.description: Notify when host licenses are running low

alternative_host_reminder.description: Notify when an alternative host is set or removed from a meeting

list_meetings_with_calendar.description: Display meeting list with calendar integration

ultrasonic.description: Automatic direct sharing using ultrasonic proximity signal

hide_host_information.description: Hide host and meeting ID from private meetings

admin_change_name_pic.description: Only account administrators can change user's username and picture

import_photos_from_devices.description: Allow importing of photos from photo library on the user's device

local_recording.description: Allow hosts and participants to record the meeting to a local file

cloud_recording.description: Allow hosts to record and save the meeting in the cloud

record_speaker_view.description: Record active speaker with shared screen

record_gallery_view.description: Record gallery view with shared screen

save_chat_text.description: Save chat text from the meeting

show_timestamp.description: Add a timestamp to the recording

recording_audio_transcript.description: Automatically transcribe the audio of the meeting or webinar to the cloud

auto_recording.description: Record meetings automatically as they start

cloud_recording_download_host.description: Only the host can download cloud recordings

account_user_access_recording.description: Cloud recordings are only accessible to account members. People outside of your organization cannot open links that provide access to cloud recordings.

auto_delete_cmr.description: Allow Zoom to automatically delete recordings permanently after a specified number of days

auto_delete_cmr_days.description: When `auto_delete_cmr` is 'true' this value will set the number of days before auto deletion of cloud recordings

third_party_audio.description: Users can join the meeting using the existing 3rd party audio configuration

google_calendar.description: Enables meetings to be scheduled using Google Calendars

google_drive.description: Enables users who join a meeting from their mobile device to share content from their Google Drive

dropbox.description: Enables users who join a meeting from their mobile device to share content from their Dropbox account

box.description: Enables users who join a meeting from their mobile device to share content from their Box account

microsoft_one_drive.description: Enables users who join a meeting from their mobile device to share content from their Microsoft OneDrive account

kubi.description: Enables users to control a connected Kubi device from within a Zoom meeting

meeting_capacity.description: Set the maximum number of participants this user can have in a single meeting

total_members.description: Total number of members in this group

x-enum-descriptions: Only members can see the group automatically. Other people can search members in the group.
All people in the account can see the group and members automatically
Nobody can see the group or search members except the members in the group

search_by_domain.description: Members can search others in the same email domain

search_by_account.description: Members can search others under same account

search_by_ma_account.description: Members can search others under same master account, including all sub accounts

x-enum-descriptions: Recurring Meeting with no fixed time

id.description: Meeting ID, also know as meeting number

host_id.description: ID of the user set as host of meeting

x-enum-descriptions: Recurring Meeting with no fixed time

host_video.description: Start video when host joins meeting

participant_video.description: Start video when participants join meeting

join_before_host.description: Allow participants to join the meeting before the host starts the meeting. Only used for scheduled or recurring meetings.

watermark.description: Add watermark when viewing shared screen

use_pmi.description: Use Personal Meeting ID. Only used for scheduled meetings and recurring meetings with no fixed time.

registration_type.description: Registration type. Used for recurring meeting with fixed time only.
x-enum-descriptions: Attendees register once and can attend any of the occurrences
Attendees need to register for each occurrence to attend
Attendees register once and can choose one or more occurrences to attend

audio.description: Determine how participants can join the audio portion of the meeting

enforce_login.description: Only signed-in users can join this meeting

enforce_login_domains.description: Only signed-in users with specified domains can join meetings

alternative_hosts.description: Alternative hosts emails or IDs. Multiple value separated by comma.

page_count.description: The number of items returned on this page

page_number.description: The page number of current results

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call

total_records.description: The number of all records available across pages

page_count.description: The number of items returned on this page

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

total_records.description: The number of all records available across pages

next_page_token.description: Next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceed the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_count.description: The number of items returned on this page

page_size.description: The number of items per page

total_records.description: The number of all records available across pages

next_page_token.description: Next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceed the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The amount of records returns within a single API call.

next_page_token.description: Next page token, used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available result list exceeds page size. The expiration period is 15 minutes.

id.description: The recording file ID.Response in general query.

recording_end.description: The recording end time. Response in general query.

play_url.description: The recording file play url. Response in general query.

download_url.description: The recording download url. Response in general query.

status.description: The recording status. Response in general query.

deleted_time.description: The recording delete time. Response in trash query.

id.description: Meeting ID, also know as meeting number

host_id.description: ID of the user set as host of meeting

share_recording.description: Determine if the meeting recording is shared

x-enum-descriptions: Registrants can watch the recording directly after registration
Registrants will receive emails then watch the recording after you approve the registration

send_email_to_host.description: Send an email to host when someone registers

show_social_share_buttons.description: Show social share buttons on registration page

repeat_interval.description: At which interval should the meeting repeat? For a daily meeting, max of 90 days. For a weekly meeting, max of 12 weeks. For a monthly meeting, max of 3 months.

weekly_days.description: Days of the week the meeting should repeat, multiple values separated by comma

monthly_day.description: Day of the month for the meeting to be scheduled. The value range is from 1 to 31.

monthly_week.description: Week for which the meeting should recur each month,

monthly_week_day.description: Day for which the meeting should recur each month

end_times.description: Select how many times the meeting will occur before it is canceled. (Cannot be used with "end_date_time".)

end_date_time.description: Select a date the meeting will occur before it is canceled.. Should be UTC time, such as 2017-11-25T12:00:00Z. (Cannot be used with "end_times".)

x-enum-descriptions: Recurring Meeting with no fixed time

start_time.description: Meeting start time. When using a format like "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'", always use GMT time. When using a format like "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss", you should use local time and you will need to specify the time zone. Only used for scheduled meetings and recurring meetings with fixed time.

duration.description: Meeting duration (minutes). Used for scheduled meetings only

timezone.description: Timezone to format start_time. For example, "America/Los_Angeles". For scheduled meetings only. Please reference our [timezone](#timezones) list for supported timezones and their formats.

password.description: Password to join the meeting. Password may only contain the following characters: [a-z A-Z 0-9 @ - _ *]. Max of 10 characters.

x-enum-descriptions: Recurring Meeting with no fixed time

start_time.description: Meeting start time. When using a format like "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'", always use GMT time. When using a format like "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss", you should use local time and you will need to specify the time zone. Only used for scheduled meetings and recurring meetings with fixed time.

duration.description: Meeting duration (minutes). Used for scheduled meetings only

timezone.description: Timezone to format start_time. For example, "America/Los_Angeles". For scheduled meetings only. Please reference our [timezone](#timezones) list for supported timezones and their formats.

password.description: Password to join the meeting. Password may only contain the following characters: [a-z A-Z 0-9 @ - _ *]. Max of 10 characters.

x-enum-descriptions: Recurring Webinar with no fixed time

start_time.description: Webinar start time, in the format "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'", should be GMT time. In the format "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss", should be local time, need to specify the time zone. Only used for scheduled webinar and recurring webinar with fixed time.

duration.description: Webinar duration (minutes). Used for scheduled webinar only

timezone.description: Timezone to format start_time. For example, "America/Los_Angeles". For scheduled meetings only. Please reference our [timezone](#timezones) list for supported timezones and their formats.

password.description: Webinar password. Password may only contain the following characters: [a-z A-Z 0-9 @ - _ *]. Max of 10 characters.

x-enum-descriptions: Recurring Webinar with no fixed time

start_time.description: Webinar start time, in the format "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'", should be GMT time. In the format "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss", should be local time, need to specify the time zone. Only used for scheduled webinar and recurring webinar with fixed time.

duration.description: Webinar duration (minutes). Used for scheduled webinar only

timezone.description: Timezone to format start_time. For example, "America/Los_Angeles". For scheduled meetings only. Please reference our [timezone](#timezones) list for supported timezones and their formats.

password.description: Webinar password. Password may only contain the following characters: [a-z A-Z 0-9 @ - _ *]. Max of 10 characters.

conference_code.description: Conference code, numeric value, length is less than 16.

leader_pin.description: Leader PIN, numeric value, length is less than 16.

number.description: Dial-in number, length is less than 16.

country_label.description: Country Label, if passed, will display in place of code.

dedicated_dial_in_number.description: List of Dedicated Dial In Numbers

number.description: Dial-in number, length is less than 16

global_dial_in_numbers.description: List of Global Dial In Numbers

number.description: Dial-in number, length is less than 16

participant_password.description: Participant Password, numeric value, length is less than 6

listen_only_password.description: Listen-Only Password, numeric value, length is less than 6

User.description: The user object represents a User on Zoom

first_name.description: User's first name. Cannot contain more than 5 Chinese words.

last_name.description: User's last name. Cannot contain more than 5 Chinese words.

use_pmi.description: Use Personal Meeting ID for instant meetings.

timezone.description: The time zone id for user profile. For this parameter value please refer to the id value in [timezone](#timezones) list.

dept.description: Department for user profile, use for report

UserUpdate.description: The user update object represents a User on Zoom

email.description: User email address. Must have id or email, if given id, the email is ignored.

audio_type.description: Determine how participants can join the audio portion of the meeting

force_pmi_jbh_password.description: Require a password for Personal Meetings if attendees can join before host

pstn_password_protected.description: Generate and require password for participants joining by phone

record_play_voice.description: Record and play their own voice

attendee_on_hold.description: Allow host to put attendee on hold

jbh_reminder.description: When attendees join meeting before host

alternative_host_reminder.description: When an alternative host is set or removed from a meeting

save_chat_text.description: Save chat text from the meeting

auto_delete_cmr_days.description: A specified number of days of auto delete cloud recordings

show_international_numbers_link.description: Show international numbers link on the invitation email

large_meeting_capacity.description: Large meeting capacity, can be 100, 200, 300 or 500, depends on if having related large meeting capacity plan subscription or not

webinar_capacity.description: Webinar capacity, can be 100, 500, 1000, 3000, 5000 or 10000, depends on if having related webinar capacity plan subscription or not

large_meeting_capacity.description: Large meeting capacity, can be 100, 200, 300 or 500, depends on if having related large meeting capacity plan subscription or not

webinar_capacity.description: Webinar capacity, can be 100, 500, 1000, 3000, 5000 or 10000, depends on if having related webinar capacity plan subscription or not

x-enum-descriptions: Recurring Webinar with no fixed time

id.description: Webinar ID, also know as webinar number

host_id.description: ID of the user set as host of webinar

x-enum-descriptions: Recurring Webinar with no fixed time

host_video.description: Start video when host joins webinar

panelists_video.description: Start video when panelists join webinar

registration_type.description: Registration type. Used for recurring webinar with fixed time only.
x-enum-descriptions: Attendees register once and can attend any of the occurrences
Attendees need to register for each occurrence to attend
Attendees register once and can choose one or more occurrences to attend

audio.description: Determine how participants can join the audio portion of the meeting

enforce_login.description: Only signed-in users can join this meeting

enforce_login_domains.description: Only signed-in users with specified domains can join meetings

alternative_hosts.description: Alternative hosts emails or IDs. Multiple values separated by comma.

show_share_button.description: Show social share buttons on registration page

allow_multiple_devices.description: Allow attendees to join from multiple devices

x-enum-descriptions: Attendee has joined a meeting before the host.
Host hasn’t launched the meeting, attendee is waiting.
All the Cloud Recordings have completed processing and is available.
Attendee registered for a meeting or webinar.
Recording audio transcript files have processed and are available.

Webhook.description: Webhook base object, only available for version 2 webhook

x-enum-descriptions: Attendee has joined a meeting before the host.
Host hasn’t launched the meeting, attendee is waiting.
All the Cloud Recordings has completed processing and is available.
Attendee registered for a meeting or webinar.
Recording audio transcript files have processed and are available.

total_records.description: The number of all records available across pages
The number of all records available across pages
The number of all records available across pages

MeetingId4Metrics.name: meetingId
MeetingId4Metrics.description: The meeting ID or meeting UUID. If given meeting ID, will take the last meeting instance.

MeetingId4Recording.name: meetingId
MeetingId4Recording.description: The meeting ID or meeting UUID. If given meeting ID, will take the last meeting instance.

NextPageToken.name: next_page_token
NextPageToken.description: Next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceed the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

PageNumber.name: page_number
PageNumber.description: Current page number of returned records

PageSize.name: page_size
PageSize.description: The number of records returned within a single API call

PageSize4Qos.name: page_size
PageSize4Qos.description: Number of items returned per page

PageToken.name: next_page_token
PageToken.description: Next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceed the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

UserId.name: userId
UserId.description: The user ID or email address

WebinarId4Metrics.name: webinarId
WebinarId4Metrics.description: The webinar ID or webinar UUID. If given webinar ID, will take the last webinar instance.
